title: Anne-Marie Trevelyan – 2022 U-Turn on Free Rail Travel for Veterans on Remembrance Day
author: admin
summary: The statement made by Anne-Marie Trevelyan, the Secretary of State for Transport, on 9 October 2022.
content:
I have ensured that the Rail Delivery Group has issued new guidance to confirm free travel for military and veterans for Remembrance Day.
